translation.en: But even here, on the Earth's frozen bottom,
translation.fr: Mais, même ici, sur le popotin glacé de la Terre,

translation.en: (penguins laughing) Joyous, frolicking, waddling, cute and cuddly life.
translation.fr: Joyeux, batifolant, gambadant. Mignons et trognons.

translation.en: Who could take these frisky little snow clowns...
translation.fr: Qui prendrait ces clowns des neiges au…

translation.en: Does anyone even know where we're marching to?
translation.fr: Quelqu'un sait seulement où on va ?

translation.en: Me, too. Me, too. Well, fine!
We'll just fly to the front of the line and see for ourselves.
translation.fr: On va voler à l'avant et voir par nous-mêmes.

translation.en: Here we go! Doing it! Come on!
Skipper, we appear to be flightless. Aw, well, what's the point of these?
translation.fr: - Commandant, on est cloués au sol. - Ça sert à quoi, ça ?

translation.en: Whoa! I like it! Hey, this could be our thing!
translation.fr: J'aime. Ça pourrait être notre truc !

translation.en: What are we gonna call it? Let's call it the, uh...
(gasping) Hey! Anybody see that? That's an egg!
Is someone gonna go get it?
Why not? Well, it's a dangerous world
translation.fr: Pourquoi ? Le monde est dangereux, là-bas.

translation.en: out there, and we're just penguins.
translation.fr: Le monde est dangereux, là-bas. On n'est que des pingouins. Juste mignons et trognons.

translation.en: You know, nothing but cute and cuddly.
translation.fr: On n'est que des pingouins. Juste mignons et trognons.

translation.en: Yeah. Why do you think there are always documentary crews filming us?
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu crois qu'on vient nous filmer ?

translation.en: You know, we lose a few eggs every year. It's just nature.
translation.fr: On perd des œufs chaque année, c'est la nature.

translation.en: I guess that makes sense, but...
something deep down in my gut tells me
translation.fr: au plus profond de mes tripes,

translation.en: that it-it makes no sense at all.
translation.fr: me dit que ça n'a aucun sens.

translation.en: You know what? I reject nature!
translation.fr: Vous savez quoi ? Je rejette la nature !

translation.en: No one's ever returned from there alive.
There's a bird down there now.

translation.fr: Des phoques léopards. Les serpents de la nature.

translation.en: How should I know? I live on the flipping frozen tundra.
translation.fr: J'en sais rien, je vis sur une toundra gelée !

translation.en: SKIPPER: They're going for the egg! Give me a way down there, ASAP!
All one would have to do is collect 300 feet of kelp,
translation.fr: illico. Suffit de ramasser 100 m de varech…

translation.en: dry it in the... Tiny and helpless, the baby penguins are frozen with fear.
translation.fr: Sans défense, les bébés pingouins sont paralysés par la peur.

translation.en: They know if they fall from this cliff,
translation.fr: Ils savent qu'en tombant de la falaise,

translation.en: we've trained to obey simple voice commands.
SKIPPER: Don't let him have it!
Okay. I guess that works. (seal growls)
SKIPPER: Boo-yah! KOWALSKI: Ha-ha! Success! Oh.
KOWALSKI: I'd recommend firing it now. Nope, hold on.
translation.fr: Je recommande une mise à feu. Une minute.

translation.en: Uh, we really should fire it. Not till we see
translation.fr: Mise à feu. Faut voir le blanc de ses yeux.
Faut voir le blanc de ses yeux.

translation.en: They're mostly pupil. Very little white. Almost none!
translation.fr: Des pupilles. Presque pas de blanc !

translation.en: They got to have a little bit of white, right?
translation.fr: Y a bien un peu de blanc.

translation.en: None whatsoever. What if they look really far to the left?
translation.fr: Nada. S'ils regardent à gauche toute ?

translation.en: We are really awesome at this.
translation.fr: On est vraiment faits pour ça.

translation.en: Boys, we did it! Mission accomplished!
Hey, hey, we can do our thing. High one!
translation.fr: Si on faisait notre truc ? Tape-m'en une !

translation.en: Oh, that's disgusting! I think I have amniotic sac in my mouth!
translation.fr: Dégueu ! J'ai du sac amniotique dans le bec !

translation.en: You don't have a family, and we're all going to die. Sorry.
translation.fr: T'as pas de famille et on va tous mourir. Désolé.

translation.en: What? I-I thought that was what we were all nodding about.
And if that ain't a family, I don't know what is.
translation.fr: Si c'est pas une famille, c'est quoi ?

translation.en: And the, uh, other five percent?
KOWALSKI: Adventure and glory like no penguins have ever seen before.
translation.fr: Aventure et gloire comme aucun pingouin avant nous.

translation.en: I swear it's gonna make me lose my salmon.
translation.fr: Je vais en vomir mon saumon !

translation.en: Somebody get that wig off Private.
I'm really getting tired of this song.
translation.fr: J'en peux plus de cette chanson.

translation.en: SKIPPER: Well, the best part of owning a circus
is you can transport a cannon over state lines.
translation.fr: L'avantage d'avoir un cirque, c'est qu'on peut trimballer un canon.

translation.en: Ten years ago on this very day,
translation.fr: Il y a dix ans, jour pour jour,

translation.en: a tiny egg hatched, and our world
translation.fr: un œuf a éclos, et notre monde

translation.en: by infiltrating the United States gold depository
translation.fr: en braquant la réserve d'or des USA

translation.en: The object of our unholy desire.
The butter on our biscuit. The royal flush.

translation.fr: Commandant. Depuis quand on interrompt des analogies ?

translation.en: what's our rule about interrupting analogies?
translation.fr: Depuis quand on interrompt des analogies ?

translation.en: The moment's gone. Private ruined it.
translation.fr: Magie rompue. À cause de Soldat.

translation.en: But, Skipper, I really... Are you questioning my leadership, Private?
'Cause I respect a soldier with some moxie.
translation.fr: Je respecte les soldats qui ont du cran.

translation.en: Really? Then I really think we should...
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Dial back the moxie, sass-mouth.
(chuckles): Oh, look at you. Still so adorable.
translation.fr: Tu t'es vu ? Toujours aussi adorable.

translation.en: AUTOMATED MALE VOICE: Please enter pass code.
Oh, come on, you're kidding right?
Kentucky, Skipper. They do love their Flatt and Scruggs.
translation.fr: On est au Kentucky, c'est des bouseux.

translation.en: AUTOMATED MALE VOICE: Y'all come in now, y'hear? Have yourself a iced tea.
translation.fr: Entrez, vingt dieux ! Un thé glacé ?

translation.en: Private, if you could have anything you wanted in the whole wide world,
translation.fr: Soldat, si tu pouvais avoir n'importe quoi au monde,

translation.en: what would it be? Well, gee, Skipper,
I think to be a meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.fr: Être un membre éminent de cette équipe.

translation.en: Ah. Well, we got you something else.
A vending machine? Well, not just any vending machine, Private.
The last remaining home in America's nanny state
for those succulent but chemically hazardous
Happy ding-dong birthday, you little scamp!
You mess with the bull, you're gonna get the horns, Private.
translation.fr: Qui sème le vent récolte la bise.

translation.en: Now, hit that machine and get your present.
translation.fr: La machine te filera ton cadeau.

translation.en: We just broke into the most secure facility in North America.
translation.fr: On vient de braquer le lieu le plus sécurisé du pays.

translation.en: You know what that means? We're wanted criminals
who'll be on the lam the rest of our lives,
translation.fr: Qu'on passera notre vie à fuir comme des criminels

translation.en: always feeling the hot breath of Johnny Law on our necks?
translation.fr: avec la loi à nos trousses ?

translation.en: SKIPPER: No! It means, as elite units go,
we're the elitest of the elite.
(Private gasping) Top shelf in the bureau.

translation.fr: L'étagère du haut. La pénultième. Plus une.

translation.en: Oh, Private. How much is he?
Well, that's outrageous. Even for Private.
translation.fr: Hors de prix. Même pour Soldat.

translation.en: I don't think I like your attitude, vending machine.
translation.fr: Je n'aime pas ton comportement, distributeur.

translation.en: I ate too many Cheezy Dibbles.
We're behind enemy lines and incredibly thirsty.
translation.fr: On est en territoire ennemi et on crève de soif.

translation.en: Rico, bust us out of this delicious prison.
translation.fr: Rico, sors-nous de cette délicieuse prison.

translation.en: You are a meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.fr: Tu es un membre éminent de cette équipe.

translation.en: two of my least favorite traits in a room.
translation.fr: Deux des pires défauts d'une pièce.

translation.en: Now, what have I told you about... Sorry, what?
It looks like some sort of giant laser
sent to kill us all, sir.
Pretty birds belong in their cages.
translation.fr: Qui a ouvert la cage aux oiseaux ?

translation.en: And I was so happy to see you again.
translation.fr: J'étais si content de vous revoir.

translation.en: The humans know me as Dr. Octavius Brine.
translation.fr: Pour les humains, le Dr Octavius Baigne,

translation.en: and frequent donor to NPR pledge drives.
by a different, much older name.
translation.fr: Mais vous me connaissez sous mon ancien nom.

translation.en: A name perhaps you'd hoped you'd never hear again.
translation.fr: Celui que vous espériez ne plus entendre.
Vous ne vous souvenez vraiment pas ?

translation.en: You may not remember me, but I could never forget you.
translation.fr: Vous m'avez peut-être oublié, mais je me souviendrai toujours de vous.

translation.en: Let's shake up some old memories.
The octopus of a thousand tricks.
You got to see this. Get up here quick!
WOMAN: Oh, they're so adorable! (crowd cheering)
Just, uh, smile and wave, boys. Smile and wave.
translation.fr: On leur fait coucou, les p'tits gars. On leur fait coucou.

translation.en: And took everything from me. GIRL: They're so cute!
They are so adorable. WOMAN: Have you ever seen anything cuter?
With you around, no one wanted an old octopus anymore.
translation.fr: Avec vous, plus besoin d'une pieuvre décatie.

translation.en: And so it went, over and over, at zoo after aquarium. Dad, look!
translation.fr: Ça recommença, encore et encore, de zoo en aquarium.

translation.en: I can't see the penguins, man!

translation.fr: D'adorables pingouins me volaient la vedette.

translation.en: some creatures are born to get all the love.
translation.fr: Je compris que certaines créatures accaparent tout l'amour.

translation.en: The rest of us get nothing!
The only thing that has kept me going all these years is my
translation.fr: Je n'ai tenu, toutes ces années, que grâce à mon ardente soif de vengeance !
que grâce à mon ardente soif de vengeance !

translation.en: And my precious souvenir snow globe collection. (Rico grunting)
translation.fr: Et ma précieuse collection de boules à neige.

translation.en: Oh, Daryl, Daryl, Daryl, you can't blame us for what happened to you.
translation.fr: Daryl, ne nous reproche pas ce qui t'est arrivé.

translation.en: That's how this whole revenge thing works.
translation.fr: C'est le moteur de la vengeance !

translation.en: I finally have the power to destroy you.
translation.fr: j'ai enfin le pouvoir de vous détruire !

translation.en: I've got some bad news for you, Dennis.
You messed with the wrong birds.
translation.fr: Tu te trompes d'oiseaux. On est une unité d'élite,

translation.en: Because we are an elite unit, the best of the best.
translation.fr: Tu te trompes d'oiseaux. On est une unité d'élite, les meilleurs des meilleurs, le top du pop-corn !

translation.en: Cream of the corn on a platinum cob.
translation.fr: les meilleurs des meilleurs, le top du pop-corn !

translation.en: And we're gonna take your deadly green goop
translation.fr: On va te piquer ta glu verdâtre,

translation.en: and sashay right out the exit hatch.
And just how are you going to do that?
Aah! The cheese, it burns! (octopi burbling)
All right, boys, it's just like Cuba.
translation.fr: Les p'tits gars, c'est comme à Cuba.

translation.en: How about some music? Something chase-y.
Ha! So you squeegees want to do the gondola mambo?
translation.fr: Vous voulez vous gondoler, les éponges ?

translation.en: Ow! Mother-of-pearl, that stings! I've lost visual.
SKIPPER: I think I got 'em. They are down, sir.
translation.fr: - Je les ai eues. - Elles sont à terre.

translation.en: Skipper! KOWALSKI: They're back up. And we are running out of canal.
translation.fr: Les revoilà ! Et c'est la fin du canal.

translation.en: (laughs) Switch to emergency power. Aye, aye, Skipper.
translation.fr: - Moteur de secours. - À vos ordres.

translation.en: PRIVATE: We've got melons! Dead ahead!
KOWALSKI: We've been boarded. SKIPPER: Initiate self-destruct sequence.
Frankly, I'm surprised we had a self-destruct sequence.
(groaning, sighing) SKIPPER: All right, boys, battle stance.
Now we, uh, spring our trap.
they're the ones that are trapped, sir.
translation.fr: C'est pas elles qui sont piégées.

translation.en: Kowalski, remember our little talk about true but unhelpful comments?
translation.fr: Kowalski, toute vérité n'est pas bonne à dire.

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Yes, sir. Sometimes we just have to wing it.
Sorry for underestimating the plan, Skipper.
It's okay, Kowalski. Just don't ever doubt me again.
translation.fr: Ça ne fait rien, mais ne recommence pas.

translation.en: Now, what the heck is going on?!
You are now under the protection of the North Wind.
translation.fr: Vous êtes sous la protection de Vent du Nord.

translation.en: Aw, you guys are so cute. (penguins protesting, groaning) You guys are just so, so cute!
Hey, get away! No more hugs!
Chart a course back to North Wind headquarters.
translation.fr: Cap sur le QG de Vent du Nord.

translation.en: Eva, inform them that we're bringing in witnesses.
translation.fr: Eva, dis-leur qu'on ramène des témoins.

translation.en: We're not going anywhere with you.
We don't even know who the heck you are.
The North Wind is an elite undercover interspe...
translation.fr: Vent du Nord est un commando d'él…

translation.en: The North Wind is an elite under...
translation.fr: Vent du Nord est un comm…

translation.en: Dedicated to helping animals who can't help themselves.
Classified, eh? What is that, uh, Dutch?
Can't really hear the accent. Excuse me?
My name is classified because I am the leader of this strike team.
translation.fr: Mon nom est confidentiel, car je dirige l'équipe.

translation.en: The seal is Short Fuse-- weapons and explosives.
translation.fr: Le phoque est Dynamite, armes et explosifs.

translation.en: The bear is Corporal-- he's our muscle.
And the owl is Eva-- intelligence and analysis.
translation.fr: Et la chouette est Eva, renseignements et analyse.

translation.en: Well, Agent Classified, we happen to be an elite unit, too.
translation.fr: Agent Confidentiel, nous sommes aussi une unité d'élite.
Agent Confidentiel, nous sommes aussi une unité d'élite. Autodestruction activée.

translation.en: You know, you should really label these things.
The name's Skipper. I run this outfit.
He's the brains of our operation.
See? He's working on a whole nother level.
translation.fr: Tu vois ? Il nous survole tous.

translation.en: And Rico, he's our demolition expert.
translation.fr: Et Rico est notre expert en démolition.

translation.en: SKIPPER: He destroyed that chair for the sheer fun of it.
translation.fr: Il a détruit cette chaise par plaisir.

translation.en: He's, uh... he's sort of our, uh,
Well, let's see how well "cute and cuddly" handles this next bit.
translation.fr: Voyons si "Mignon et trognon" va apprécier.

translation.en: KOWALSKI: Whoa. Wow. PRIVATE: Look at this.
Not a bad place you got here, Classified.
Thank you. That's not my name.
translation.fr: Merci. Ce n'est pas mon nom.

translation.en: All right, tiny penguins, the best way for the North Wind
translation.fr: Petits pingouins, la meilleure façon de protéger

translation.en: to protect helpless animals like yourselves
translation.fr: la meilleure façon de protéger les faibles comme vous, c'est de capturer le Dr Baigne.

translation.en: is to bring Dr. Brine to justice.
translation.fr: les faibles comme vous, c'est de capturer le Dr Baigne.

translation.en: Now, you were inside his sub,
so I need to know everything you know.
translation.fr: Vous étiez dans son sous-marin. Dites-moi tout.

translation.en: Just tell me everything you know.
Never trust a Dutchman in a tulip fight.
translation.fr: Pas de duel à la tulipe en Hollande.

translation.en: Tulip fight... Canada is secretly training an army of Sasquatch.
translation.fr: Le Canada entraîne une armée de Bigfoots.

translation.en: Sasquatch... Hot dogs are, in fact, only 17 percent actual dog. 17 percent...
translation.fr: Les hot-dogs ne contiennent que 17 % de dogue.

translation.en: Just everything regarding your abduction by Dr. Octavius Brine.
translation.fr: Tout ce qui concerne votre enlèvement par le Dr Baigne.

translation.en: Why didn't you say so? What?
My team has uncovered that Dr. Octavius Brine
translation.fr: Mon équipe a découvert que le Dr Baigne

translation.en: is actually an individual known as Derek.
translation.fr: est connu sous le nom de Derek !

translation.en: Dave. As Dave the octopus. SHORT FUSE: An octopus?
Dr. Brine is not an octopus. He is...
translation.fr: Dr Baigne n'est pas une pieuvre. C'est…

translation.en: That's exactly what our intel indicated.
What you, of course, could not know is that Dr. Brine's laboratory in Venice
translation.fr: Mais vous ignoriez que le labo du Dr Baigne à Venise

translation.en: is secretly developing a doomsday weapon
translation.fr: met secrètement au point une arme ultime,

translation.en: Ah, but what you don't know is that Dirk... Dave.
translation.fr: Mais toi, tu ignores que Dirk…

translation.en: Dave won't be using his bazooka serum...
translation.fr: Dave n'utilisera pas son Sérum de Buse…

translation.en: Medusa Serum. Medusa Serum on anybody.
You... You stole the Medusa Serum?
Well, stole the serum, saved the day, did your job for you.
translation.fr: Volé le Sérum, sauvé le monde, fait votre boulot.

translation.en: I can't hear anything. Your microphone, it's not on.
Click on the button with the picture of the microphone.
Every time a villain calls in, this happens.
So annoying. Now we can hear you, but we cannot see you. Every time.
translation.fr: Là, on a le son, mais pas l'image.

translation.en: It's like talking to my parents.
Yes, we've got you; that's fantastic. Excellent. Now, where was I?
I see you've met my old zoo-mates.
translation.fr: Vous avez rencontré mes anciennes relations.

translation.en: We were never mates. There was no mating.
You're powerless now that I've stolen your precious Medusa Serum. What? You?
translation.fr: Tu es impuissant, j'ai volé ton précieux Sérum.

translation.en: You didn't steal that. It's over.
Then why did I call you?
Oh, maybe it was to show you this.
Oh, you thought this was just about you four?
translation.fr: Vous pensiez que ce n'était que pour vous ?

translation.en: Now, if you'll excuse me, I have to go do some shopping...
translation.fr: Veuillez m'excuser. J'ai quelques courses à faire

translation.en: Incoming alert. Put it on the screen.

translation.fr: Le zoo de Berlin. 15 pingouins disparus.

translation.en: BOTH: We have to move! What?
Time for our A-game. Everybody, huddle up.
Corporal, ready the jet. I'm initiating North Wind Protocol Zeta.
translation.fr: Caporal, le jet. Protocole Vent du Nord "zeta".

translation.en: 12 more penguins taken from London Zoo.
translation.fr: 12 pingouins enlevés au zoo de Londres.
Bon. C'est le grand moment. La mission qu'on attend depuis toujours.

translation.en: The mission we've been preparing for our entire lives.
translation.fr: C'est le grand moment. La mission qu'on attend depuis toujours.

translation.en: We're gonna take down Dave or die trying.
translation.fr: Faut dégommer Dave à tout prix.

translation.en: Kowalski, cancel our improv class! Yes, sir. Rico, equipify. Hi!
translation.fr: Kowalski, annule le cours d'impro. Rico, équipifie.

translation.en: Private, do that little thing I like.
I got them to credit our class.
SKIPPER: Oh, yeah, baby! Whee! Just like Super Bowl 19!
translation.fr: Cool, ma poule ! Comme au Super Bowl !

translation.en: This mission has no place for a pathetic waddle of useless penguins! Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa!
translation.fr: Pas de place pour de pitoyables pingouins !

translation.en: See, Rico, that's why you can't have nice things.
You know, uh, (grunts) I'm, uh, pretty good with computers myself.
translation.fr: Moi aussi, je suis un pro en informatique.

translation.en: SHORT FUSE: Put on your jammies, penguin.
Aw. They are even cute when they're asleep.
I want these butterballs out of my way
Ship them to one of our safe houses.
The most remote place on the planet.
I suggest we limit our breathing.
Sorry! I get gassy when I fly.
translation.fr: Désolé. Voler me donne des gaz.

translation.en: We must be on a plane.
What did North Wind do to us?
translation.fr: Vent du Nord nous a fait quoi ?
Ils nous ont filé des badges !

translation.en: That low-down dirty dog is trying kick us off the mission.
translation.fr: Ce sale clébard veut nous écarter de la mission.

translation.en: He thinks we can't save the penguins
translation.fr: Il croit que des pingouins ne peuvent pas sauver
Il croit que des pingouins ne peuvent pas sauver des pingouins.

translation.en: Well, penguins are our flesh and feathers. They're us.
translation.fr: Les pingouins sont la chair de nos plumes !

translation.en: And if anyone's gonna save us, it's us.
translation.fr: Si quelqu'un peut nous sauver, c'est nous.

translation.en: But, Skipper, we've got to be five miles up.
translation.fr: Mais on est à 8 000 m d'altitude.

translation.en: That pretty much limits our options.
but now we seem to be outside the plane.
translation.fr: Mais on n'est plus dans l'avion.

translation.en: Well, kind of got caught up in the moment.
translation.fr: Je me suis un peu lâché !

translation.en: Okay, Kowalski, your turn to pick up the slack.
Oh, why don't we catch that plane?
KOWALSKI: We've got another target at 12 o'clock.
Follow me, boys! We're going in hot.
translation.fr: En avant, les p'tits gars ! Chaud devant !

translation.en: No one likes a show-off, Private.
Kowalski, where does this aircraft go?
From the odd shape of this bagel, I'd say we're headed for Paris.
translation.fr: Vu la forme du bagel, je dirais Paris.

translation.en: France? Forget it! Not with their tax laws!
translation.fr: En France ? Pas avec leur fiscalité !

translation.en: Then I would suggest a mid-air transfer.
translation.fr: Je suggère un transfert en vol.

translation.en: Affirmative. Peanuts! Peanuts! Peanuts! Peanuts, peanut, peanut, peanut, peanut, peanut, peanut!
We're out of peanuts, Skipper! Try pretzels, Private.
translation.fr: - Plus de cacahuètes. - Passe aux bretzels.

translation.en: Can't stay, doll. Danger is my mistress.
translation.fr: Je te largue, poupée. Je suis fiancé au danger.

translation.en: We're out of pretzels! Yeah? Then we're leaving just time,
translation.fr: Bretzels ! Plus de bretzels ! Il est temps de partir, ça va être la panique !
Il est temps de partir, ça va être la panique !

translation.en: PRIVATE: We're gonna catch it, we're gonna catch it!
Crikey! We're not gonna catch it!
Time to get creative. Start grabbing boxes, boys.
Oh, Private, stop playing with those backpacks.
translation.fr: Joue pas avec ces sacs à dos.

translation.en: Now we're talking. Let's get to work.
translation.fr: Voilà qui est mieux. Au boulot.

translation.en: Okay, then. It's clear what we need to do next.
translation.fr: Bon. On sait ce qui reste à faire.

translation.en: If we're gonna take Dexter down, we need to know where he's gonna strike next.
translation.fr: Pour arrêter Dexter, il faut connaître ses plans.

translation.en: Elijah, would you please take them away.
Rub the angry out of the tummy.
We are going to save those helpless penguins, because...
translation.fr: Nous allons sauver ces pingouins sans défense.

translation.en: we are the North Wind, and no one...
translation.fr: Nous sommes Vent du Nord. Et personne…

translation.en: Now, we rescued those four penguins already, didn't we?
translation.fr: On a sauvé ces quatre pingouins, non ?

translation.en: Shipped them off all cozy and snug (beeping) to a Madagascar... How come there's beeping?

translation.fr: D'où vient ce bip ? Ces pingouins

translation.en: they never made it to Madagascar.
Well, where the dickens are they?
From my calculations, we've arrived in the center of Dublin, Ireland.
translation.fr: D'après mes calculs, nous sommes à Dublin, en Irlande.

translation.en: All right, soldiers, we got to blend in.
No time to kiss the Blarney stone, boys.
translation.fr: Pas le temps pour le tourisme.

translation.en: We need to find intel on Dave's location, pronto.
translation.fr: Découvrons où se cache Dave. Pronto !

translation.en: All right, you, where's Dave! Give us the goods.
Spit it out! Don't make me use shillelagh! Sir, that's...
Stranded on the Emerald Isle without a single clue.
translation.fr: Échoués sur l'Île d'Émeraude sans un indice !

translation.en: Well, so much for the luck o' the Irish. KOWALSKI: Skipper, look!
translation.fr: C'est ça, la chance des Irlandais ?

translation.en: No. But it looks like Dave's been busy.
translation.fr: Non, mais Dave n'a pas chômé.
Il a volé des pingouins à Guadalajara.

translation.en: PRIVATE: Osaka! KOWALSKI: Rio de Janeiro!

translation.fr: Les boules à neige de Dave.

translation.en: It's every zoo and aquarium he got kicked out of!
translation.fr: Tous les zoos et aquariums dont on l'a viré !

translation.en: Don't tell me where he has been,
translation.fr: Ne me dites pas où il était,

translation.en: tell me where he will have has been next.
translation.fr: mais où il aura été après.

translation.en: (retching) Wait, what is it, Rico? It's a book!
It's a film! It's a play! (retching continues)
translation.fr: Un livre ! Un film ! Une pièce !

translation.en: Dave hasn't been there yet, Skipper. If we hurry, we can still stop him.
translation.fr: Dave n'y est pas encore allé. En faisant vite, on l'aura.

translation.en: Pack your bagpipes, boys. It's time to blow this potato stand.
translation.fr: Rangez vos cornemuses. On se carapatate.
Le célèbre quartier irlandais de Shanghai.

translation.en: (gasps) Skipper, look! I see you, Private. (laughs)
Who's the big boy standing on his tippy-toes?
Wha...? No, I mean... I just want to eat you up.
Dave's next target-- Shanghai's famous mermaid penguins.
translation.fr: Dave va s'en prendre aux Pingouins-Sirènes de Shanghai.

translation.en: you've proved that you are a meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.fr: que tu es un membre éminent de cette équipe.

translation.en: Shanghai Marine World is pleased to present
translation.fr: le Marine World de Shanghai présente

translation.en: Tonight, our mermaids dedicate their performance
translation.fr: Ce soir, nos Sirènes dédient leur numéro

translation.en: to all the missing penguins around the world.
translation.fr: à tous les pingouins disparus du monde.

translation.en: Stay safe, little guys, wherever you are.
translation.fr: Courage, les petits, où que vous soyez.

translation.en: And we hope you come home real soon.
Now, keep those eyes roving, boys.
Dave is a master of disguise.
translation.fr: Dave est un maître du déguisement.

translation.en: He could be a small child, a house plant,

translation.fr: une plante, peut-être même vous ou moi !

translation.en: Operation Flash, Splash and Crash is a go!
ANNOUNCER (over P.A.): Penguin feeding time will begin in two minutes.
translation.fr: On nourrit les pingouins dans deux minutes.

translation.en: Target, 30 yards and closing. (imitates radio static)
And, frankly, you're the only one who can pull off that look.
translation.fr: T'es le seul à pouvoir assumer.

translation.en: But I can do more, Skipper. I want to help the team.
translation.fr: Je veux faire plus. Je veux aider l'équipe.

translation.en: If you think I'm ready, which I am. (chuckles)
translation.fr: Si vous me croyez prêt. Et je le suis !

translation.en: Assuming you agree. And perhaps even... if you don't?
translation.fr: Avec votre accord. Et peut-être même sans.

translation.en: I like the moxie, soldier, but right now,
translation.fr: J'aime ton cran, mais je préfère une queue et un sourire désarmant.

translation.en: I need a tail on that tush and the cutest smile you've got.
translation.fr: mais je préfère une queue et un sourire désarmant.

translation.en: Look, they let one of the mermaids out of the tank!
translation.fr: Ils ont fait sortir une Sirène !

translation.en: It's the cutest thing I've ever seen.
Target is stunned. Rico, bring the Splash.
Oh, what are you doing out here, cutie? Come on.
Secure the mermaids and find me...

translation.fr: Un peu tard, Vent du Nord.

translation.en: the one that belongs to us-- into custody.
translation.fr: celui qui nous appartient, sous bonne garde.

translation.en: He's going in through the pipes!
You got to get out of there!
He's getting away. He's getting away!
But can you fly it, man? There's only one way to find out.
translation.fr: - Tu peux le piloter ? - Un seul moyen de savoir.

translation.en: No, I, uh... still can't read.
SKIPPER: Too much, too much, too much, too much, too much!
I'm getting the hang of this, Skipper.
Good! We're coming for you, Private!
Those ludicrous butterballs are letting David escape!
translation.fr: Ces petits boudins laissent David s'échapper !

translation.en: Eva, secure transport. Short Fuse, Corporal, hitch us a ride.
translation.fr: Eva, sécurise l'engin. Dynamite, Caporal, un bateau !

translation.en: Sir, Dave is pulling ahead. We are too heavy.
translation.fr: Dave nous sème, on est trop lourds.

translation.en: Oh, curse our heavily cheese-dibbled diet!
Rico, give me a West Helsinki fire sale.
That's everything, sir. Have you purged the chemical toilet?
translation.fr: - C'est tout ! - Tu as purgé les WC chimiques ?

translation.en: But Rico was in there for 15 minutes!
(beeping) Self-destruct sequence in five, No, Private!
Private has been kidnapped by Dave,
translation.fr: Soldat a été kidnappé par Dave.

translation.en: while we have been cast adrift for what seems like days.
translation.fr: Et on dérive sans doute depuis des jours.

translation.en: Kowalski is sick as a dog.
And Rico keeps trying to eat him.
translation.fr: et Rico essaie de le manger.

translation.en: Just, please, just cut it out.
Not sure how long we can hold on.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas si on tiendra.

translation.en: This may be my final entry.
EVA: Mmm, the salmon is delicious. SHORT FUSE: Oh, I have never
translation.fr: de pêches blanches. Ce saumon est délicieux.

translation.en: been more hydrated in my life.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais été aussi hydraté !

translation.en: Let me cut you a piece of the salmon. No, thank you.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais été aussi hydraté ! Laisse-moi te servir du saumon.

translation.en: I'm stuffed. It's the most delicious thing
translation.fr: - J'ai fait le plein. - Rien de meilleur à bord.

translation.en: on the boat. (sighs) I have to loosen
translation.fr: - J'ai fait le plein. - Rien de meilleur à bord. Je desserre ma ceinture.

translation.en: my utility belt. No, I'm full.
translation.fr: Je desserre ma ceinture. Plus faim. Jette-le dans l'océan.

translation.en: Just dump it in the ocean.
You know, we're all in the same boat here.
translation.fr: On est tous dans le même bateau.

translation.en: And perhaps you could express a little more concern
translation.fr: Et vous pourriez vous excuser d'avoir volé et détruit

translation.en: over the fact that you stole and destroyed
translation.fr: Et vous pourriez vous excuser d'avoir volé et détruit un véhicule à 19 millions de dollars !
un véhicule à 19 millions de dollars !

translation.en: We're picking up a signal, sir. (beeping)
but it stopped at that remote island.
translation.fr: À 5 km au sud-ouest. Ça s'arrête à cette île perdue.

translation.en: Good on you. You've tracked down some land.
translation.fr: Bravo, vous avez repéré une terre.

translation.en: We've been tracking your little secretary/mascot.
What? You put a homing device on Private?
translation.fr: Vous avez collé un GPS à Soldat ?

translation.en: All of you, actually, when I darted you.
translation.fr: À vous tous. Grâce aux fléchettes.
renifleur de croupe, buveur de cuvette de WC !
Tu vois ? Je te l'avais dit.

translation.en: You should've left this to the professionals.
I bet you're all just dying to know why I brought you here.
translation.fr: Vous devez vous demander ce que vous faites ici.
Vous devez vous demander ce que vous faites ici. Il va tous nous tuer !

translation.en: My Medusa Serum doesn't kill anyone.
translation.fr: Mon Sérum de Méduse ne tue personne.

translation.en: (high-pitched voice): So, um, what does it do?
Well, that's exactly what I came up here to show you.
translation.fr: C'est exactement ce que je suis venu vous montrer.

translation.en: All I need is a test subject.
Hello, little buggy-boo! Is this about the chirping? 'Cause I could... Whoa!
the full power of the Medusa Serum.
translation.fr: Regardez-moi déclencher l'immense pouvoir du Sérum de Méduse !

translation.en: And all you adorable penguins are next!
You'll never get away with this, Dave.
translation.fr: Tu ne t'en tireras pas, Dave.

translation.en: and together we'll take a wrecking ball to your whole rotten operation.
translation.fr: Et ensemble, nous démolirons ton organisation pourrie.

translation.en: Turns out the elite unit will be coming to us.
translation.fr: Apparemment, l'unité d'élite va venir à nous.

translation.en: Uh, those two are very close together.
physically, but... but not in, uh...
in the belly of that beast.
translation.fr: dans le ventre de ce monstre.

translation.en: We've faced some long odds before, Skipper,
translation.fr: On en a vu des vertes et des pas mûres,

translation.en: but these look like the longest and oddest.
translation.fr: mais ça, c'est la plus verte et la moins mûre.

translation.en: If we're gonna pull this off, we'll need a diversion.
translation.fr: Si on veut réussir, il faut faire diversion.

translation.en: FEMALE COMPUTER VOICE: Deactivating jungle camouflage.
you were supposed to handcuff them to the rock!
translation.fr: Dynamite, tu devais les menotter au canot.

translation.en: I tried, but they don't have hands. They just have flippers, boss.
translation.fr: Mais ils ont que des nageoires.

translation.en: And-and I have flippers! So it's flipping useless!
translation.fr: Comme moi. On nage en plein délire !

translation.en: (growls) All right, pooch. If you won't work with us,
translation.fr: Cabot, si tu bosses pas avec nous,

translation.en: I give the orders around here.
Much as it pains me, I need you to act as our diversion for our operation, understood?
translation.fr: Navré, à vous de faire diversion pour nous. Pigé ?

translation.en: Nope! This is our plan, and it requires you to cause a diversion. Die-version. Dih-version.
translation.fr: Non, c'est notre plan. À vous de faire div…

translation.en: Gentlemen, there is only one way to resolve this.
translation.fr: Messieurs, un seul moyen de résoudre ça.

translation.en: That's what I was gonna say.
we strike fast and strike hard!
Get on in here, boys! Slap him silly, Rico! Come on!
translation.fr: Gifle-le, Rico ! Kowalski, libère les otages !

translation.en: Now, that's what I'm talking about, big fella!
we celebrate with a well-earned high one,
translation.fr: on fête ça par un tape-m'en une général,

translation.en: and feast off Dave's sweet remains.
translation.fr: et on déguste les restes de Dave.

translation.en: Especially... the bit where you slap the fruit.
translation.fr: Surtout les baffes sur le fruit.

translation.en: Oh! Corporal, dim the lights. Short Fuse,
My apologies. Had to rush a bit.

translation.fr: le schéma est un peu grossier.

translation.en: Where is that music coming from?
Wow. AGENT CLASSIFIED: All right, at 2150, Skipper,

translation.fr: Commandant, Kowalski et Richard, c'est ça ?

translation.en: die-vert the octopi away from their posts.
breaches the hull with a swarm of self-guided underwater nano-charges.
translation.fr: perce la coque à l'aide de nanocharges sous-marines.

translation.en: I call them "wet kabooms." Yes, please don't.
The North Wind who? The North Wind who doesn't
translation.fr: Vent du Nord qui ? Vent du Nord qui ne joue pas à toc-toc,

translation.en: have time for knock-knock jokes because we're too busy
translation.fr: Vent du Nord qui ne joue pas à toc-toc, parce qu'on veut dégommer Dave !

translation.en: See that? I don't even look back.
translation.fr: Voyez ? Je ne me retourne pas.

translation.en: There's a huge explosion, and I just keep walking.
translation.fr: Ça explose de partout, et j'avance.

translation.en: Way to go, boss! That's North Wind,
translation.fr: Bravo ! Ça, c'est Vent du Nord !
Bravo ! Ça, c'est Vent du Nord ! Bien joué.

translation.en: A good plan is about more than effecty stuff and...
translation.fr: Un bon plan, c'est plus que des effets spéciaux

translation.en: (chuckles): Oh. And you, you... you certainly know
translation.fr: et du vocabulaire. Et tu t'y connais en bons plans.

translation.en: a good plan-- I mean, your operation in Shanghai
translation.fr: Et tu t'y connais en bons plans. Ton opération à Shanghai a permis à Dave de s'enfuir

translation.en: allowed Dave to escape with... your boy.
translation.fr: Ton opération à Shanghai a permis à Dave de s'enfuir avec ton homme.

translation.en: I've never lost a member of my team.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais perdu un seul équipier.

translation.en: Can't imagine the guilt, the regret,
the feeling that, uh, I don't know, that...
(sputtering exhale) it should have been you.

translation.fr: Pour le plan de Vent du Nord ?

translation.en: I'm sorry, boys, but I can't lead you this time.
translation.fr: Navré, les p'tits gars. Je commanderai pas, cette fois.
et vous êtes notre commandant, Commandant.

translation.en: We don't... we don't need these guys.
I think... it's time we leave it to the professionals.
translation.fr: Je crois qu'on va laisser faire les pros.

translation.en: We take our orders from Agent Classified now.
(quietly): We take this shame to our graves.
David the octopus, show me your tentacles.
translation.fr: David la pieuvre, tentacules en l'air.

translation.en: We lost them, Skipper. Not a moment too soon.
translation.fr: On les a semées. Pas trop tôt. Ces hosen m'irritent la bundesliga.

translation.en: These hosen are riding up my bundesliga.
translation.fr: Pas trop tôt. Ces hosen m'irritent la bundesliga.

translation.en: All right, boys, grab your coconuts and hold 'em tight.
translation.fr: Bon. Accrochez-vous à vos noix de coco.

translation.en: Classified should be walking away from a huge explosion
translation.fr: Confidentiel devrait sortir d'une explosion avec Soldat

translation.en: with Private on his shoulder in three... two...
translation.fr: Confidentiel devrait sortir d'une explosion avec Soldat dans trois, deux…

translation.en: The Private is back! Welcome home, Private!
fireworks may have been a tactical mistake.
translation.fr: le feu d'artifice n'ait été une erreur.

translation.en: SHORT FUSE: Stay calm! Do not panic!
Be full of love! Don't hate!
Follow your dreams! Love yourself! Love other people!
translation.fr: Vivez vos rêves ! Aimez-vous les uns les autres !

translation.en: Pick and choose your battles in life! Don't let anyone tell you what to do!
Love the one you're with! Eva.
Welcome, Skipper, Kowalski and rootin'-tootin' Rico! The gang's all here!

translation.fr: L'équipe est là ! L'ambiance est électrique !
Tout le monde est enfin là ?

translation.en: All right, Dave, just what have you done with...
You're in for it now, Dave! Really?!
translation.fr: - Ton compte est bon, Dave. - Vraiment ?

translation.en: Now, who's ready to move on to live penguin testing?
translation.fr: Parés à tester sur un vrai pingouin ?

translation.en: SKIPPER: You point that death ray away from Private
translation.fr: Pointe ce rayon de la mort

translation.en: right now! It's not a death ray, Skipper.
translation.fr: ailleurs ! Pas "de la mort". Il va nous transformer en monstres !

translation.en: He's gonna turn us into monsters!
translation.fr: Pas "de la mort". Il va nous transformer en monstres !

translation.en: Oh, horrible mutant penguins unleashed on the streets of New York City!
translation.fr: D'horribles pingouins mutants dans les rues de New York !
Je suis le monstre. Tout le monde me l'a dit,

translation.en: Everyone made that clear to me every day of my entire life.
translation.fr: Je suis le monstre. Tout le monde me l'a dit, chaque jour de ma vie.

translation.en: But now, let's see how much everyone loves you
translation.fr: Mais voyons voir qui vous aimera
- Tu ne l'enlaidiras pas ! - Il est mignon !

translation.en: He's the cute one! That's-that's his thing.
translation.fr: - Tu ne l'enlaidiras pas ! - Il est mignon ! C'est son truc !

translation.en: What? It's all the little guy's got!
You are super cute. We better crank this up.
translation.fr: Tu es super trognon. Il en faut plus.

translation.en: Negotiations have broken down. Rico, the paper clip! Bust us out of here!
translation.fr: - Les négociations sont rompues ! - Rico, le trombone. Sors-nous de là !

translation.en: Oh, well, this is why we test things, people.
translation.fr: C'est à ça que servent les tests.

translation.en: I'll have to lower the power for the others.
translation.fr: Il faudra que je diminue la puissance.

translation.en: Whatever Dave's paying you, I'll double it.
translation.fr: je t'offre le double de ce que te donne Dave.

translation.en: Is that a yes? Does anyone speak octopus?
Sorry. No, not a clue. Blast it.
Oh, great. Oh, no! This is it!
translation.fr: - Génial. - Non ! - C'est la fin ! - Je veux pas finir écrabouillé !

translation.en: CORPORAL: I don't want to die all squishy!
translation.fr: - C'est la fin ! - Je veux pas finir écrabouillé !

translation.en: (chuckles) Super. Well done, Private! Good work, malinki.
All right, agents, we are back in business.
all those penguins, they're this way!
translation.fr: tous les pingouins sont par là !

translation.en: And so is a massive army of octopi.
And as soon as we return to the North Wind headquarters, grab fresh equipment,
translation.fr: Dès qu'on sera revenus au QG pour s'armer

translation.en: and work up a smashing new plan,
we'll come speeding back and take down Dave.
But the penguins are in danger! We have to go now!
translation.fr: Mais les pingouins sont en danger ! Il faut y aller !

translation.en: So, because you failed once, you're just running away?
translation.fr: À cause d'un échec, vous fuyez ?

translation.en: We did not fail. And we are not running away.
translation.fr: On n'a pas échoué, et on ne fuit pas.

translation.en: Skipper wouldn't care. Plan or no, fancy equipment or no...
translation.fr: Commandant irait sans plan ni équipement !

translation.en: he'd never leave a man behind.
Well, I suppose we can't all be penguins, can we?
translation.fr: On ne peut pas tous être des pingouins.

translation.en: Listen up, Doris! You turn us into freaks,
translation.fr: Minute, Doris ! Tu fais de nous des monstres

translation.en: You think that's gonna make everybody love you?
translation.fr: Tu crois que les gens t'aimeront ?

translation.en: And I'm sure gonna love that.
REPORTER: Breaking news! The missing penguins have been found!
translation.fr: Dernière minute ! Les pingouins ont été retrouvés !

translation.en: Okay. According to my notes, genetic researcher
translation.fr: Selon mes notes, le généticien Octavius Baigne

translation.en: Dr. Octavius Brine has found the penguins
translation.fr: Selon mes notes, le généticien Octavius Baigne ramène les pingouins à Battery Park.

translation.en: and is bringing them here to New York's Battery Park.
translation.fr: ramène les pingouins à Battery Park.

translation.en: The penguins are coming back! Oh, my gosh! Look!
translation.fr: Les pingouins reviennent ! Bon sang, regardez !

translation.en: Penguin lovers of the world, guess who I found.
translation.fr: Amis des pingouins, devinez qui j'ai trouvé !

translation.en: It wasn't easy, but seeing the penguins get what they deserve
translation.fr: Pas simple, mais offrir aux pingouins ce qu'ils méritent

translation.en: What a weird thing to say! I'm so excited!
I'm up here! Up here! It's like I can still hear his little voice calling to us.
translation.fr: Je crois encore entendre sa petite voix.

translation.en: You have to get out of there! Move!
"You have a great otter, there. Moo."
What are you asking me for? I'm not Private's little ghost.
translation.fr: Est-ce que je sais ? Je suis pas le fantôme de Soldat.

translation.en: Oh, the people love you. Just go give them a hug.
translation.fr: Les gens vous adorent. Allez les câliner !

translation.en: Well, the fun and games are just beginning. Watch this, penguins.
translation.fr: Mais la rigolade ne fait que commencer. Regardez ça !

translation.en: And when the exterminators take you away, you never come back.
translation.fr: Quand les exterminateurs vous emmènent, vous ne revenez jamais !

translation.en: What do I do? What do I do?
Come on, then. You want to go? You want some argy-bargy?
translation.fr: Venez ! Vous voulez de la castagne ?

translation.en: What a wonderful day in the park.
Hold on! What are you doing?!
I've got a plan, but I need your help.
translation.fr: J'ai un plan, mais j'ai besoin de vous.

translation.en: You've got to get a grip! (hissing) (gasps)
Kowalski, Eva is worried about you.
(normal voice): She is? Wh-What did she say?
translation.fr: C'est vrai ? Elle a dit quoi ?

translation.en: Did she say my name specifically?
I mean, were there... were there tears? Details, come on, tell me!
translation.fr: Y a eu des larmes ? Je veux des détails !

translation.en: This feels a little awkward, but I'm happy.
translation.fr: Ça fait drôle, mais je suis content.

translation.en: SKIPPER: Rico! You need to listen to us. (burps)
I guess you're kind of the same either way.
Looks like we're back in business, boys.
translation.fr: Les affaires reprennent, les p'tits gars.

translation.en: And our business is saving penguin-kind.
translation.fr: Notre devoir est de sauver la pingouinité.

translation.en: Yeah! Let's create and feel momentum.
Sir, how long do we stand here like this?
translation.fr: On doit rester longtemps comme ça ?

translation.en: Now all we need is a plan. I've got one. Eh? Uh, huh?
translation.fr: - Manque plus qu'un plan. - J'en ai un !
Tu as volé le rayon de Dave ?

translation.en: Well, I figured if we could reverse the ray, we could turn everyone

translation.fr: on rendrait tout le monde normal.

translation.en: In order to reverse the ray,
translation.fr: Mais impossible. Pour ça, il faudrait remplacer le Sérum de Méduse

translation.en: we would need to replace the Medusa Serum with a power source
translation.fr: Pour ça, il faudrait remplacer le Sérum de Méduse par un générateur de mignon-trognon intégral !
par un générateur de mignon-trognon intégral !

translation.en: Immeasurable cuteness? Where the heck are we supposed to get that?
translation.fr: Mignon-trognon intégral ? Où tu veux qu'on trouve ça ?

translation.en: We don't know what that will do to you! Aah!
The ray! It works! It works!
There's a hand attached to his butt. That was not...
translation.fr: Il a une main au popotin ! C'était pas…

translation.en: that was not there before. Get out of there!
Permission to defy order. Permission denied!
It's too risky, Private. It already made you sprout a butt-hand!
translation.fr: Trop risqué. Tu as déjà une main au popotin !

translation.en: I know it has to be me this time.
translation.fr: Je sais que mon heure est venue.

translation.en: And I think you know it, too.
translation.fr: Je crois que vous le savez aussi.

translation.en: now that I have my revenge,
translation.fr: à l'heure de ma vengeance, je me sens…
à l'heure de ma vengeance, je me sens… vide.

translation.en: as if what I needed all along was...
translation.fr: Comme s'il me fallait depuis toujours

translation.en: In fact-- Robin, write this down--
tomorrow we move on to kittens!

translation.fr: Aux toutous, aux lapins, aux pandas !

translation.en: Hugh, Jack, man the battle stations!
We're still gonna need that victory cake!
translation.fr: Prépare le gâteau de la victoire !

translation.en: We're only gonna get one shot at this, boys!
translation.fr: On n'aura qu'une chance, les p'tits gars.

translation.en: How we doing on those snow globes?
Hold off those octopi! We're doing this now!
translation.fr: Retenez ces poulpes ! On va en finir !

translation.en: PRIVATE: Behind you! Beside you! Six o'clock! Twelve o'clock!
translation.fr: Derrière ! À côté ! À 6 h ! 12 h !

translation.en: PRIVATE: They're coming from every direction!
There's just too many of them!
SHORT FUSE: Oh... that's why you look back at the explosion.
translation.fr: C'est pour ça que tu te retournes vers l'explosion.

translation.en: Suck it up, Kowalski. Whoa, whoa.
Then why is Rico throwing me a fresh pair of double-A's?
translation.fr: Alors, pourquoi Rico m'envoie des piles neuves ?

translation.en: SKIPPER: Excuse me. Emergency. (Rico growls) Coming through. KOWALSKI: Sorry about the foot.
Make a hole! Make a hole!
KOWALSKI: Don't worry, uh... a-a chrysalis
Oh! Hey! (grunts) What's wrong? What are you... Look out for the...
Whoa, now. Have I got something...
Okay, looking up. Cover your eyes.
and will probably be hunted for sport.
If there's anything we've learned from this delightful adventure-- Kowalski--
translation.fr: Mais cette délicieuse aventure nous a enseigné une chose.
C'est pas le physique qui compte.

translation.en: It's what you do that counts.
And look at what you did.
translation.fr: Et regarde ce que tu as fait.

translation.en: you are the most meaningful and valued member of this team.
translation.fr: Tu es le membre le plus éminent de cette équipe.

translation.en: You did it! We're so proud of you!
translation.fr: Bravo, Soldat, tu as réussi ! On est fiers de toi !

translation.en: You saved us! We love you, Private!
translation.fr: Tu nous as sauvés ! On t'aime, Soldat !

translation.en: Yeah, we love you! You the penguin!
(Dave groans) Dave. Oh-ho, look at you.
I'm just getting started. I'm about to...
translation.fr: Tu crois que c'est fini ? Ça commence à peine.

translation.en: What do we do with him now?
I hope you find happiness, Dave.
It's snowing! It's snowing! It's snowing! It's snowing!
uh, um, this is difficult for me to say.
translation.fr: j'ai du mal à le dire…

translation.en: Is it "osteoporosis"? You just got to lean into the vowel.
you four are the bravest agents I've ever known.

Okay, on three. One, three, go.
I'm just gonna do a little practice push. Aah!

translation.en: Hey! Now, that's the Private we know and love. High one!

translation.en: You know, if I'm being honest, I expected a little more... pizzazz!
